[Skip to main content](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062377244-How-do-I-manage-and-report-on-abandoned-or-incomplete-bookings-pre-bookings#main-content) * * * Learn how to [manage](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062377244-How-do-I-manage-and-report-on-abandoned-or-incomplete-bookings-pre-bookings#h_01HSRQH6YJ38PGTCJAG1EB9DHB), [report](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062377244-How-do-I-manage-and-report-on-abandoned-or-incomplete-bookings-pre-bookings#h_01HSRQSK3PQNSN1TGF7CSCD0EJ) on, and be [notified](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062377244-How-do-I-manage-and-report-on-abandoned-or-incomplete-bookings-pre-bookings#h_01HSRRNDZ8ZWG692H2XGTFTQC4) of abandoned or incomplete Customer bookings, including understanding incomplete bookings from the [Customer's perspective](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062377244-How-do-I-manage-and-report-on-abandoned-or-incomplete-bookings-pre-bookings#h_01HSS58345BE9T9Q6N5XZRQ4RP). * * * ## **Accessing the features mentioned in this article** **What more do I need to use this feature?** - [Admin](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868502205212) or [restricted](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868490374428) permissions to _View all Reports_, _Export Data_, and _Manage Notifications_. **Which Checkfront version supports this feature - classic items, classic products, or both?** - This feature is available in both our classic version using classic items (Inventory > Items) and our classic version using classic products (Inventory > Products).  → [Learn more about products](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868100241052) * * * ## Introduction to abandoned or incomplete bookings [Back to top](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062377244-How-do-I-manage-and-report-on-abandoned-or-incomplete-bookings-pre-bookings# "Back to top") After a Customer submits the booking form, they are directed to the payment page. The system then creates the booking with a temporary _Pre-booking_ status and holds the booking inventory until payment is complete. | | | | --- | --- | | ![Note](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868062274460) | A _Pre-booking_ is a temporary, internal system status that cannot be applied manually. | Inventory within a _Pre-Booking_ is held for 15 minutes. The inventory is released if the booking is not completed before the hold time expires. The Customer has the option to extend the hold time when prompted. Should payment not be completed, the system considers the booking abandoned or incomplete and stays in the _Pre-booking_ status. | | | | --- | --- | | ![Note](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868062274460) | There is no option to adjust the default _Pre-Booking_ hold time. | * * * ## Managing abandoned or incomplete bookings [Back to top](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062377244-How-do-I-manage-and-report-on-abandoned-or-incomplete-bookings-pre-bookings# "Back to top") _Pre-bookings_ are held in the system for 30 days.  **Account Activity** report (Reports > Account Activity) entries showing the _Pre-booking_ event are permanent. This gives you time to reconcile your reports and our Support team time to troubleshoot missing payments. Within these 30 days, Staff can access _Pre-bookings_ to change their status or add payment as needed. | | | | --- | --- | | ![Note](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868062274460) | If your Ecommerce settings do not require payment to complete a booking, the booking status is automatically set to the default Customer Status in the **Configuration** area (Manage > Setup > Configuration).
Bookings created through the _[Checkfront](https://www.checkfront.com/)_ API bypass the _Pre-booking_ status and are set to the default Staff Status selected in the **Configuration** area (Manage > Setup > Configuration). | * * * ## Abandoned or incomplete bookings from the Customer's perspective [Back to top](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062377244-How-do-I-manage-and-report-on-abandoned-or-incomplete-bookings-pre-bookings# "Back to top") ![Payment Page Back Button](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868062325788) While Customers do not see the internal _Pre-booking_, they can cancel a booking after arriving on the payment page (and before completing payment) by clicking the **Back** button. ![Booking Page Clear](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868074259100) They are returned to the booking page, where they can select **Clear** and then **Confirm?** to confirm the selection. | | | | --- | --- | | ![Note](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868062274460) | A _Pre-booking_ cleared by a Customer converts the booking's status from _Pre-booking_ to _Void_ in the system. | * * * ## Reporting on abandoned or incomplete bookings [Back to top](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062377244-How-do-I-manage-and-report-on-abandoned-or-incomplete-bookings-pre-bookings# "Back to top") The following reporting tools allow you to filter results by the _Pre-booking_ status: - [Booking Calendar](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868279247900) - [Booking Index](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868166711068) - [Daily List](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868194447132) - [Daily Manifest](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868102802204) By default, reports exclude _Pre-bookings_, but you can include them by selecting the option from the **Status** filter. You can also view and export the [Account Activity](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868268001692) report to view _Pre-booking_ entries _._ | | | | --- | --- | | ![Learn More](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868039253532) | Learn more about reporting here:
- [Getting Started with Reporting: FAQ](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868215665948) | * * * ## Notifications of abandoned or incomplete bookings [Back to top](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062377244-How-do-I-manage-and-report-on-abandoned-or-incomplete-bookings-pre-bookings# "Back to top") ![Pre-booking Scheduled Notification](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868073648284) You can schedule and receive notifications for bookings that have been abandoned without payment, e.g. Schedule a notification to be sent 24 hours after pre-booking. Follow these steps. 1. Create or edit an existing notification in the **Notifications** area (Manage > Notifications). 2. Select _Pre-booking_ for the Booking Status. 3. Choose the _Scheduled_ option under the **Deliver** setting and set up the desired timeframe, e.g. _1 day after booking creation date_. 4. Finish up the notification configuration by choosing the subject, recipients, inventory, and email content that works best for you. 5. After you have finished setting up the notification, click **Save**. | | | | --- | --- | | ![Learn More](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868039253532) | Learn more about how to set up email notifications here:
- [Introduction to email notifications](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868151287964) |
